title: Preparation of a novel antibacterial magnesium carbonate coating on a titanium surface and its in vitro biocompatibility
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,10516-10525
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA00399C, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Shougang Xiang, Chengdong Zhang, Zhenju Guan, Xingping Li, Yumei Liu, Gang Feng, Xuwei Luo, Bo Zhang, Jie Weng, Dongqin Xiao
We report deposition of a MgCO3 coating on titanium surfaces using a hydrothermal method, followed by hydrogen peroxide treatment. The coating demonstrated antibacterial properties and enhanced osteogenic differentiation of BMSC.
